metadata.name: Cold War
metadata.description: 1962: the Cold War is at its peak as the Cuban Missile Crisis threatens to launch the world into a nuclear holocaust. The timing couldn't be worse for Russia's latest secret weapon to go rogue. Genetically created Vampires. Twisted mutated victims left over from Nazi experimentation – designed to infiltrate missile sites and cause havoc. Their destination... Cuba. With the world on the brink - the clock is ticking.
